plot: It's becoming rare nowadays for full length show to have survived from this era, but that's what you get here. Devo Live 1980 features the August 17th show at the Phoenix Theatre, Petaluma in 1980.
title: Devo: Live 1980
plot_es: It's becoming rare nowadays for full length show to have survived from this era, but that's what you get here. Devo Live 1980 features the August 17th show at the Phoenix Theatre, Petaluma in 1980.
